Headline: Results Press Release for March 31, 2025
Annoucement_Description: the karur vysya bank has made highest ever profit of rs 1942 cr for the year ended . total business crossed 186569 crore with deposits crossing 1 trillion during the fourth quarter of the year. total deposits as on march 2025 crossed rupees one lakh crore and stands at 102078 crore registering a yoy growth of 14.55% i.e. up by 12965 crore from 89113 crore. total business as on march 31 2025 stands at 186569 crore. net profit for the quarter registered a growth of 12.50% and stood at 513 crore.ppop increased by 17.60% is at 835 crore as compared to 710 crore for the previous year.
